question: What is the rainfall forecast for The Highlands West of the Rift Valley, the Lake Victoria Basin and the Rift Valley (Kisii, Nyamira, Nandi, Kericho, Bomet, Kakamega, Vihiga, Bungoma, Siaya, Kisumu, Homabay, Busia, Migori, Narok, Baringo, Nakuru, Trans-Nzoia, Uasin-Gishu, Elgeyo-Marakwet, West-Pokot, Siaya, Kisumu, Homabay, Busia and Migori Counties) this week?
answer: For the week of 6 to 12 August 2024, The Highlands West of the Rift Valley, the Lake Victoria Basin and the Rift Valley (Kisii, Nyamira, Nandi, Kericho, Bomet, Kakamega, Vihiga, Bungoma, Siaya, Kisumu, Homabay, Busia, Migori, Narok, Baringo, Nakuru, Trans-Nzoia, Uasin-Gishu, Elgeyo-Marakwet, West-Pokot, Siaya, Kisumu, Homabay, Busia and Migori Counties) can expect morning rains as well as afternoon and night showers and thunderstorms over few places.

question: What is the rainfall forecast for North-western Kenya (Turkana and Samburu Counties) this week?
answer: For the week of 6 to 12 August 2024, North-western Kenya (Turkana and Samburu Counties) can expect morning rains as well as afternoon and night showers and thunderstorms over few places occasionally spreading to several places during the first half of the forecast period.

question: What is the rainfall forecast for The Highlands East of the Rift Valley (including Nairobi County) (Nyandarua, Laikipia, Nyeri, Kirinyaga, Murang'a, Kiambu, Meru, Embu, Tharaka-Nithi and Nairobi Counties) this week?
answer: For the week of 6 to 12 August 2024, The Highlands East of the Rift Valley (including Nairobi County) (Nyandarua, Laikipia, Nyeri, Kirinyaga, Murang'a, Kiambu, Meru, Embu, Tharaka-Nithi and Nairobi Counties) can expect intermittent cloudiness, with light rains over few places, is expected in the mornings giving way to sunny intervals. Afternoon and night showers are expected over few (mostly high-ground) areas.

question: What is the rainfall forecast for North-eastern Kenya (Marsabit, Mandera, Wajir, Garissa and Isiolo Counties) this week?
answer: For the week of 6 to 12 August 2024, North-eastern Kenya (Marsabit, Mandera, Wajir, Garissa and Isiolo Counties) can expect sunny intervals during the day while nights are likely to be partly cloudy. However, morning rains as well as afternoon and night showers may occur over some parts of Marsabit County during the first half of the forecast period.

question: What is the rainfall forecast for The South-eastern lowlands (Machakos, Kitui, Makueni, Kajiado and Taita-Taveta Counties) this week?
answer: For the week of 6 to 12 August 2024, The South-eastern lowlands (Machakos, Kitui, Makueni, Kajiado and Taita-Taveta Counties) can expect occasional cloudiness in the morning giving way to sunny intervals. Nights are likely to be partly cloudy.

question: What is the rainfall forecast for The Coast (Mombasa, Tana-River, Kilifi, Lamu and Kwale Counties) this week?
